tokens.text: extracts and validates pack manifest information

title: Pack Manifest Info
description: Extracts and validates information from behavior pack and resource pack manifest.json files including names, descriptions, UUIDs, versions, and icons.

fields.title: BP Name
fields.description: The name field from the behavior pack manifest header. This is displayed in the game's pack selection UI.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the name string from manifest header

fields.title: BP Description
fields.description: The description field from the behavior pack manifest header. Provides a brief summary of the pack's contents.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the description string from manifest header

fields.title: BP Custom ID
fields.description: The custom identifier for the behavior pack, if specified. Used for internal referencing.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the custom id string if specified

fields.title: BP Min Version
fields.description: The minimum Minecraft version required to use this behavior pack. Format: [major, minor, patch].
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version array as string

fields.title: BP UUID
fields.description: The unique identifier (UUID) for the behavior pack. Must be unique across all packs.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the UUID string from manifest header

fields.title: BP Manifest
fields.description: General information extracted from the behavior pack manifest.json file.

fields.title: RP Min Version
fields.description: The minimum Minecraft version required to use this resource pack. Format: [major, minor, patch].
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version array as string

fields.title: RP UUID
fields.description: The unique identifier (UUID) for the resource pack. Must be unique across all packs.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the UUID string from manifest header

fields.title: RP Manifest
fields.description: General information extracted from the resource pack manifest.json file.

fields.title: RP Name
fields.description: The name field from the resource pack manifest header. This is displayed in the game's pack selection UI.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the name string from manifest header

fields.title: RP Description
fields.description: The description field from the resource pack manifest header. Provides a brief summary of the pack's contents.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the description string from manifest header

fields.title: RP Custom ID
fields.description: The custom identifier for the resource pack, if specified. Used for internal referencing.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the custom id string if specified

fields.title: RP Format Version
fields.description: The format_version field from the resource pack manifest. Determines which manifest features are available.

fields.title: Sub Packs
fields.description: Information about subpacks defined in the manifest. Subpacks allow tiered content for different device capabilities.

fields.title: RP Icon
fields.description: The pack_icon.png found in the resource pack root. Used to display the pack in selection screens.

fields.title: BP Icon
fields.description: The pack_icon.png found in the behavior pack root. Used to display the pack in selection screens.

fields.title: Skin Pack Icon
fields.description: The pack_icon.png found in the skin pack root. Used to display the pack in selection screens.

fields.title: Subpack Tiers
fields.description: Analysis of subpack memory_tier configurations. Tiers should be properly ordered for device capability matching.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains subpack tier configuration analysis
